description: Need a pro for AI Video and SEO
proposal:
### Proposal for Freelancer.com (Focus: Speed & Technical)
Language: English

Hello,
I have reverse-engineered your project: 'Need a pro for AI Video and SEO'.
Here is the technical roadmap to solve your pain points immediately:

| Phase | Milestone | Deliverable |
|-------|-----------|-------------|
| 1 | Technical Audit & Reverse Engineering | Gap Analysis |
| 2 | Arsenal Integration (Video/Traffic/SEO) | Technical Solution |
| 3 | Performance Scaling & ROI Tracking | Performance Report |

Technical Stack:
- Video: Pipeline Veo 3 + Nano Banana (Fidelidade 4K) + ElevenLabs (Sound Design)
- Traffic: CAPI (Conversions API) + GTM Server-Side + Estratégia de Atribuição Avançada
- SEO: GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) + AEO (Answer Engine Optimization) + Knowledge Graph @graph
- Content: Técnica Nugget (Answer-First) + Information Gain (E-E-A-T)

Test Keywords: [REVERSE-ENGINEERING], [4K-PIPELINE], [CAPI-OPTIMIZATION].

### Proposta para 99Freelas (Foco: ROI & Consultoria)
Idioma: Português

Olá,
Analisei seu projeto 'Gestor de tráfego com CAPI' e identifiquei os gargalos que estão travando seus resultados.
Minha abordagem foca em ROI real e consultoria estratégica, não apenas execução técnica.

Sugiro começarmos com um **Projeto Piloto** focado em validação rápida.

Nosso Arsenal Técnico Diferenciado:
- Vídeo: Pipeline Veo 3 + Nano Banana (Fidelidade 4K) + ElevenLabs (Sound Design)
- Tráfego: CAPI (Conversions API) + GTM Server-Side + Estratégia de Atribuição Avançada
- SEO: GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) + AEO (Answer Engine Optimization) + Knowledge Graph @graph
- Conteúdo: Técnica Nugget (Answer-First) + Information Gain (E-E-A-T)

Podemos agendar uma conversa para eu te mostrar como aplicaremos isso no seu caso?

description: Looking for an SEO expert to improve rankings
proposal:
### Proposal for Upwork (Focus: Seniority & Case Studies)
Language: English

Dear Hiring Manager,
After reviewing your project description ('Looking for an SEO expert to improve rankings'), I've applied a reverse-engineering lens to identify the core business objectives.
My senior approach ensures that every technical decision is backed by ROI and high-fidelity standards.

Strategy Highlights:
- High-Fidelity Production: Pipeline Veo 3 + Nano Banana (Fidelidade 4K) + ElevenLabs (Sound Design)
- Data Attribution: CAPI (Conversions API) + GTM Server-Side + Estratégia de Atribuição Avançada
- Generative Search Dominance: GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) + AEO (Answer Engine Optimization) + Knowledge Graph @graph
- Authority Building: Técnica Nugget (Answer-First) + Information Gain (E-E-A-T)

#### Screening Questions:
Q1: What is your SEO strategy?
A: [Detailed technical response addressing 'What is your SEO strategy?' using CAPI (Conversions API) + GTM Server-Side + Estratégia de Atribuição Avançada and GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) + AEO (Answer Engine Optimization) + Knowledge Graph @graph principles.]

I have successfully implemented similar strategies in past cases. Looking forward to discussing how we can replicate those results for you.
